channel.title: Crocus Sativus on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Crocus Sativus on funPlantGenes

item.title: CsGT45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsGT45 Gene Name: flavonoid glucosyltransferase Genome: Species: Crocus sativus Functional Descriptions: Using degenerate primers designed to match the plant secondary product glucosyltransferase (PSPG) box we cloned a full length cDNA encoding CsGT45 from C.

item.title: CstNCED
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CstNCED Gene Name: plastid 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase Genome: Species: Crocus sativus Functional Descriptions: An NCED gene, CstNCED, was cloned from Crocus sativus stigmas.

item.title: CsULT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsULT1 Gene Name: ultrapetala transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Crocus sativus Functional Descriptions: Identification, cloning and characterization of an ultrapetala transcription factor CsULT1 from Crocus: a novel regulator of apocarotenoid biosynthesis.
